code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{ChevronDown}from"lucide-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const terms=[{title:"Acceptance of Terms",content:"By booking accommodation or using services at Southcoast Outdoors, guests agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions, as well as any additional rules communicated during their stay.
